resources.string: Go down one floor and head outside.
From outside the door, take a right into the alley.
Head down to the end of the path.
Slight left and continue straight. Enter Keller Hall.
Slight left and turn right into the hall. Follow signs for 3–115.
Turn left. Your destination will be on the right.
Exit the room. Immediately make a left turn
Head on straight until you reach the elevator near the entrance.
Head on straight until you reach the elevator near the entrance.
Press “down” on the elevator. In the elevator press floor C.
Exit the elevator and follow the signs to Keller.
Proceed through the red doors to enter the Keller building.
Press up on the elevator. In the elevator select the 3rd floor.
Make a slight right and head forward.
Turn right on the first hallway you see. Then turn left at the end of the hallway.
Walk forward and you will see the classroom to your right.
